001package net.tnemc.item.example.listeners;
002
003import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.MiniMessage;
004import org.bukkit.Material;
005import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
006import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
007import org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent;
008import org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent;
009import net.tnemc.item.example.Example;
010import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013import java.util.Collections;
014
015public class PlayerJoinListener implements Listener {
016
017  @EventHandler
018  public void onJoin(final PlayerJoinEvent event) {
019
020    Example.instance().getPlatform().calculations().giveItems(Collections.singletonList(Example.instance().getItem()), event.getPlayer().getUniqueId());
021    Example.instance().getPlatform().calculations().giveItems(Collections.singletonList(Example.instance().getPlatform().createStack("paper")
022                                                                                                .setProviderItemID("forest_axe")
023                                                                                                .setItemProvider("nexo")), event.getPlayer().getUniqueId());
024
025    //event.getPlayer().getWorld().dropItemNaturally(event.getPlayer().getLocation(), new ItemStack(Material.GOLD_INGOT, 1));
026  }
027}
